Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao

Class SupplierDao

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.AbstractDao<SupplierEntity>
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.dao.SupplierDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SupplierDao extends AbstractDao<SupplierEntity>
The SupplierDao class provides database operations for SupplierEntity instances. It extends the AbstractDao class to inherit common database operations.
See Also:

    • merge

      public void merge(SupplierEntity supplier)
      Merges the state of the given supplier into the current persistence context.
      Overrides:
      merge in class AbstractDao<SupplierEntity>
      Parameters:
      supplier - the supplier to be merged.

    • findByName

      public SupplierEntity findByName(String name)
      Finds a supplier by the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the supplier to be found. The name is unique for each supplier. It is used to identify the supplier. It is a string.

    • findById

      public SupplierEntity findById(int id)
      Finds a supplier by the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the supplier to be found. The id is unique for each supplier. It is used to identify the supplier. It is an integer.

    • findNameById

      public String findNameById(int id)
      Finds the user ID associated with a given session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID for which the user ID is to be found.
      Returns:
      The user ID associated with the given session ID, or -1 if no such session exists.

    • findIdByName

      public int findIdByName(String name)
      Finds the ID of a supplier based on the supplier's name. This method queries the database for the ID of the supplier with the specified name. If the supplier is found, their ID is returned. If not found, -1 is returned.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the supplier.
      Returns:
      The ID of the supplier if found, -1 otherwise.

    • getAllNames

      public List<String> getAllNames()
      Retrieves all supplier names from the database. This method queries the database for the names of all suppliers and returns them as a list.
      Returns:
      A list of all supplier names.

    • findSupplierContactByName

      public String findSupplierContactByName(String supplierName)
      Finds the contact information of a supplier based on the supplier's name. This method queries the database for the contact information of the supplier with the specified name. If the supplier is found, their contact information is returned. If not found, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      supplierName - The name of the supplier whose contact information is being requested.
      Returns:
      The contact information of the supplier if found, null otherwise.
